title: Bug 49299 Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 Incorrect Custom Cookie Name Behavior
description: Bug 49299 Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrectly states that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.
OB: The page sends the following cookie: SetCookie: MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F; Path=/cookiename; HttpOnly, but the Reload link on the page uses 'jsessionid': http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;jsessionid=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F4.
EB: The expected behavior is for the output to be "MySomeClass".
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Deploy the attached war file as cookiename.war.
2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/.
